DOC.brief_summary: To date , RCT examine efficacy Trauma-Focused Cognitive Behavioral Therapy Sexually Exploited , War Affected Adolescent Girls Democratic Republic Congo . This study seek fill gap designing , implement test intervention use intervention wait list control group .
